      • setTransitionTime

        public void setTransitionTime(int transitionTime)
        Sets transition time for scene. Duration of the transition for a recall of this scene in 100 millisecond steps. The transition to take to go to this state in 100ms So 1 means 100ms, 10 means 1 second. Range: 0 (instant) - 65535 (longest fade)
        Parameters:
        transitionTime - in second
